text: Max Golden (1895–1976) was an American film producer.McGowan p.201 He was employed by 20th Century Fox where he worked on B films including the Jones Family series. ==Selected filmography== * Laughing at Trouble (1936) * Educating Father (1936) * Every Saturday Night (1936) * The Jones Family in Big Business (1937) * A Trip to Paris (1938) * Hawaiian Nights (1939) ==References== ==Bibliography== * John J. McGowan. J.P. McGowan: Biography of a Hollywood Pioneer. McFarland, 2005. ==External links== * Category:1895 births Category:1976 deaths Category:American film producers
title: Max Golden
